events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting relevant experience in backend development and API design.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's software development background and skills listed.
A recruiter was assigned to manage the candidate's process, expressing initial optimism about the applicant's fit for the engineering role.
The candidate participated in an initial screening call, demonstrating strong knowledge of software engineering principles and good communication skills.
The candidate promptly responded to the interview invitation, showing enthusiasm for the next steps in the hiring process.
The technical interview was scheduled with the candidate for the following week to assess coding and problem-solving skills in detail.
